# Roof Shingle Replacement Contract

## Contract Information

* **Contract Reference**: CB-9070-91354194
* **Contract Solicitation Number**: 01B46-23-091
* **Contract Amendment Number**: 4
* **Contract Publication Date**: September 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: October 4, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Contract Status**: Expired

## Contract Description

The Charlottetown Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is inviting tenders for the replacement of roof shingles at their location. The scope of work includes the replacement of the roof shingles at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre located at 440 University Avenue, Ottawa.

## Tender Period and Requirements

The tender period closes on October 4, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. Tenders must be submitted through the CanadaBuy service provider's platform. It is mandatory for bidders to obtain all related specifications, plans, and drawings, as well as all other tender documents through this platform. Addenda, if issued, will also be available on the platform.

## Contract Officer and Contact Information

The Contract Officer is Jacques Toussaint, who can be contacted at:

* Email: jaques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: 438-455 8237

## Site Visit

A site visit is optional and will take place on September 21, 2023 at 9:30 AM local time.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price.
